abilities.name: Heat Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Heat Rotom's type is Fire until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Warm Up
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Heat Burn
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
